question: How to use Book Keeper application on MacBook/iMac?
answer:
Book Keeper is currently designed for Windows and does not natively support macOS. However, you can still use Book Keeper on a Mac by installing Windows using one of the following methods:

1. Parallels Desktop (Recommended):
- Download and install Parallels Desktop: https://www.parallels.com/
- Follow the guide to install Windows: https://kb.parallels.com/4729
- Install Book Keeper: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pDA547rqHiU
- Book Keeper will be fully functional.
Video Tutorial: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=9oQT8HDeIu8

2. Boot Camp (Recommended):
- Use macOS's inbuilt Boot Camp to install Windows: https://support.apple.com/en-in/boot-camp
- Install Book Keeper: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pDA547rqHiU

3. Virtual Machine (VMware Fusion):
- Download VMware Fusion: https://www.vmware.com/in/products/fusion.html
- Follow the guide to install Windows: https://docs.vmware.com/en/VMware-Fusion/10.0/com.vmware.fusion.using.doc/GUID-F2874B79-A32A-4B83-914F-9838372D47CD.html
- Install Book Keeper: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=pDA547rqHiU

Note: All options require you to install Windows.

question: How to make a new iOS phone as the admin device.
answer: 1. Open Book Keeper with admin credentials, and click on 'Continue as User' 2. Tap on the top bar that shows 'Logged in as User (MOB1/iOS1)'. 3. A screen will appear showing the current admin device. 4. If you've lost access to the admin device, tap on the caption 'Devices associated with this company' 10–15 times. A hidden dialog will appear—tap 'Yes' to make the current device the new admin.

question: How to generate E-Way Bill from iOS device?
answer: Book Keeper iOS does not supports E-Way Bill Generation. Please use Windows or Android to generate E-Way bill.

question: How to generate E-invoice from iOS device?
answer: Book Keeper iOS does not supports E-invoice Generation. Please use Windows or Android to generate E-invoice.

question: Want single series option in iOS.
answer: Single series is available in Windows and Android only.

question: How can I generate the GSTR reports in Excel or JSON format from the iOS application?
answer: Currently, it is not possible to download the GSTR report in Excel or JSON format from the iOS application. On iOS, you can only download the report in HTML or PDF format.
